publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1384 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Protection of Scotland's Peatlands—That the Parliament recognises the great importance of natural lowland peatlands to Scotland’s biodiversity; notes the 3,500 signature petition being submitted to the Parliament by the Scottish Wildlife Trust, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce measures to reduce peat consumption and ensure peatland sites receive strict protection.

S1M-1384 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Protection of Scotland's Peatlands—That the Parliament recognises the great importance of natural lowland peatlands to Scotland’s biodiversity; notes the 3,500 signature petition being submitted to the Parliament by the Scottish Wildlife Trust, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce measures to reduce peat consumption and ensure peatland sites receive strict protection.
S1M-1384 Protection of Scotland's Peatlands (lodged on 21 November 2000) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1384 Protection of Scotland's Peatlands (lodged on 21 November 2000) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1384 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Protection of Scotland's Peatlands-That the Parliament recognises the great importance of natural lowland peatlands to Scotland's biodiversity; notes the 3,500 signature petition being submitted to the Parliament by the Scottish Wildlife Trust, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce measures to reduce peat consumption and ensure peatland sites receive strict protection. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-1384 Protection of Scotland's Peatlands (lodged on 21 November 2000) Robin Harper*, Scott Barrie*

S1M-1384 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Protection of Scotland's Peatlands-That the Parliament recognises the great importance of natural lowland peatlands to Scotland's biodiversity; notes the 3,500 signature petition being submitted to the Parliament by the Scottish Wildlife Trust, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce measures to reduce peat consumption and ensure peatland sites receive strict protection. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Robin Harper, Scott Barrie

S1M-1384 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Protection of Scotland's Peatlands-That the Parliament recognises the great importance of natural lowland peatlands to Scotland's biodiversity; notes the 3,500 signature petition being submitted to the Parliament by the Scottish Wildlife Trust, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce measures to reduce peat consumption and ensure peatland sites receive strict protection. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Robin Harper, Scott Barrie, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-1384 Protection of Scotland's Peatlands (lodged on 21 November 2000) Robert Brown*
S1M-1384 Protection of Scotland's Peatlands (lodged on 21 November 2000) Des McNulty*, Mr Jamie Stone*

Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Robin Harper, Scott Barrie, Mr John McAllion, Robert Brown, Des McNulty, Mr Jamie Stone
